programme.title: Backcountry Traditions S2:E1 "Alaska Part 1"
programme.desc: Angry Eagle Lodge and Outfitters is a paradise lodge nestled in the corner of lake Lliamna in Alaska. Accessible only by plane, this remote yet luxurious lodge has prime access to the greatest fly fishing waters the world has to offer. This is their story.

programme.title: Backcountry Traditions S2:E2 "Alaska Part2"
programme.desc: Alaska is the crown jewel of fisheries. Its undisturbed ecosystem enables the Bristol Bay region to produce and sustain the world's largest sockeye population. The future of this delicate ecosystem is currently threatened by an existential and non-reversible threat. Knowledge is power. Learn how you can join the fight to save and preserve Bristol Bay.

programme.title: Lunkerville S13:E5 "Slick Nick Goes to Fish College"

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E5 "Northern Rockies Lodge Part One"

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E6 "Northern Rockies Lodge Part Two"
programme.desc: Brendan and Blake Sloan fly to different remote alpine lakes in northern BC and have an incredible experience while searching for monster-sized lake trout.

programme.title: RMEF S4:E14 "Clair"
programme.desc: Volunteers are the heart of the Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation and Clair Harris is the quintessential example. A volunteer since its inception in 1984, he accumulated more than 7,000 hours volunteering for RMEF’s Flagstaff Arizona Chapter. His motivation is simple - help wildlife and protect it for future generations. His reward is the simple satisfaction that he has done so. Follow along as Clair hunts the Express UUBar in New Mexico for a management bull and reflects on a lifetime of volunteering.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Christian Pieper - Glutton for Punishment
programme.desc: Christian Pieper is an award-winning and crowd-pleasing comedian from Beaver Dam, Kentucky, now living in Los Angeles. In just five years as a performer, Christian has quickly earned acclaim for his honest, smart, and welcoming approach to personal material, layering unexpectedly subversive observations on current events, culture, and relationships.A two-time semifinalist in the prestigious Boston Comedy Festival, hes also been featured in the Crossroads Comedy Festival, Burbank Comedy Festival, and other festivals and competitions across the country. Christian has also performed abroad, having done shows for troops and civilians in eight different countries, and was a guest on the Bob & Tom show. He currently hosts and produces Adrenaline, a comedy-challenge show presented regularly at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Salt Lake City and the Hollywood Improv.

programme.title: Bob Smiley - Tartar Terrorist
programme.desc: In-demand stand up comedian known for his machine gun approach and hilarious, clean material.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Brad Upton - Will Be Funny For Money
programme.desc: Brad Upton first stepped on stage in September of 1984 and he's never looked back. This ex-grade school teacher is now in his 30th year of comedy and is nearing 6000 lifetime performances. He is a past winner of the Las Vegas Comedy Festival and appeared recently at Caesar's Palace as part of the HBO Comedy Festival. He has spent the last eight years as the opening act for the legendary Johnny Mathis and did multiple shows all over the country with the late, great Joan Rivers. He has also been seen in concert with The Smothers Brothers, Smokey Robinson, Kenny Rogers, Dolly Parton, Lewis Black, George Jones, Glen Campbell, Pam Tillis and many others. Coast to coast all over North America isn't the only place Brad performs. In 2014 Brad headlined in Singapore, Hong Kong, The MGM in Macau and did eight nights in Israel as part of the Comedy for Koby benefit. His new CD entitled, "Brad Uptonogood" is heard regularly on Sirius Satellite Radio and is available online wherever music is sold. He also just released his first DVD entitled, "Brad Upton, Live from the 509".

programme.title: Ty Barnett - Yep
programme.desc: Ty Barnett, a Chicago native, got his start at Seattle’s Comedy Underground. Whoopi Goldberg called Ty “hilarious” and reviewers have said he is “thought provoking” and “edgy”. All this praise earned him many television appearances. He hosted the Food Network’s Mealin’ and Dealin’, Discovery Family’s Babies Behaving Badly and Beasts Behaving Badly, and appeared in over 15 national commercials. It all began when he was one of the two finalists on the most-watched and Emmy nominated season of Last Comic Standing. Ty went on to multiple Tonight Show appearances where Jay Leno called Ty “one of the funniest comedians working”. He also appeared in HBO’s Bad Boys of Comedy, his own Comedy Central Presents and one-hour special Issues. Ty was named “one to watch” by the Hollywood Reporter. He’s also been seen on the sitcoms Samantha Who, Til Death, Life in Pieces, NickMom Night Out and Tosh.O. His comedy album, Grown Man-Baby Steps is a favorite on Sirius XM.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Sid Davis - Baggage Claim
programme.desc: This former airline worker hilariously unloads side-splitting baggage on stage. Sid's humor is fueled with A.D.D., a wavering ego, and a grade school teacher wife who views him as a child left behind.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus - A Mild and Skinny Guy
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Jason Hewlett - Father Time
programme.desc: The Award-Winning One-Man Show of Jason Hewlett The Entertainer will have you laughing until it hurts. Comedy, Music, Impressions, and Standing Ovations make Jason the perfect entertainer. His brand of Hilarious G-Rated Entertainment is unlike anything you have ever enjoyed. Over 2,000 shows for more than 1 Million audience members in his incredible career make Jasonís show an event you will remember for years to come.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Nazareth - American by Choice
programme.desc: Award Winning Comedian Nazareth, has been seen by over 40 Million people around the world through live concerts, TV and Radio broadcasts. His list of TV appearances include: Comedy Central, ABC Family, NBC, CBS, and TBN.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brian Bates - Uber Important
programme.desc: Turning to comedy after twenty years in corporate America, Brian Bates jokes about ubering his hecklers home, meeting women while hiking, and people who dont believe in God but do believe in wrestling.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Poolos - One Wife, Two Daughters, and Zero Influence
programme.desc: Mark stands 6'7" weighs in at 350 technically a giant however he is very weak and a wimp. In his routines, he weaves the story of his life as a bumbling jolly giant in his fast engaging storytelling style. He has been compared to Louie Anderson. Mark is a true road dog, performing in 40 states and all across Canada. Mark's ultimate dream is to do a film that people actually will have seen.

programme.title: Jason Love - Jokes On Me
programme.desc: One of today's busiest comics, Jason Love has appeared on HBO, Comedy Central, America's Got Talent, and over 20 national broadcasts.Jason works clean and incorporates music, making him a favorite for companies like Google, Chevron, Farmers, and Costco.Says L.A. Weekly: "Jason Love is comedy that brings people together."From the Hollywood Improv to Carolines on Broadway, Jasons audience continues to grow. He has performed overseas for the troops and on the seas for cruise lines. Jason was a finalist at the Cabo Comedy Festival and at the World Series of Comedy in Vegas.Jasons non-profit, Love &amp Laughter, brings free shows to cancer support communities and others in need. His podcast is produced by Levity Entertainment. He is represented by Don Casino Productions.

programme.desc: Dr. Bill Schindler explains why the processes we have in place today in the food industry lead to a less healthy and enriched lifestyle. The way humans eat animals has shifted. These parts of animals are almost completely absent from modern day diets and these provided much more nutrition than just the animal's meat.

programme.title: Machu Picchu, Peru featuring Brian Culbertson,Jessy J, Bob Baldwin
programme.desc: The Incans built this 15th century complex in the Peruvian Andes Mountains by perfectly fitting together polished, cut stones without the use of mortar. In some cases the stones were so enormous and the results so impressive that just how the Incans accomplished the building of Machu Picchu remains a mystery.

programme.title: Sinister Squad
programme.desc: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death's Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains is coerced into fighting in the modern world, but these baddies must learn to keep their true wickedness at bay if they want any chance at freedom.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Automata | Full Series
programme.desc: In an alternate 1930's New York City, private eye Sam Regal and his incredibly smart automaton partner, Carl Swangee investigate a murder. Directed by Van Alan

programme.title: ALTER Collection | Women in Horror Vol. 1
programme.desc: Our bodies abused and our minds belittled, these horrors explore the issues that women face in the world. From creepy landlords to gaslighting relationships and everything in between.

programme.title: ALT | Full Series
programme.desc: When Val Mayfield returns to her rural home of Poe County to bury her deceased father, she discovers a message from beyond the grave - setting off a perilous journey into a mysterious place found between life and death.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E1 | Earth Station
programme.desc: Ex-NASA astronaut Max Levodolinsky readies his piece-of-junk space freighter for his latest transpo run to the Moon—while bickering with Space Traffic Control, his husband, his boss, and… his new pilot-in-training?!?

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E2 | Trainee
programme.desc: Despite his objections, Max is forced to take on fresh astronautics graduate Tommie al-Qasimi. She accidentally unleashes a computer virus that could kill them both after discovering that she can’t stand Max’s taste in music.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E3 | Ransomware
programme.desc: Max and Tommie race against the clock as the virus takes over their ship and thrusts them into the crosshairs of Earth’s orbital defense systems. To Tommie’s dismay, Max makes the most of some very teachable moments.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E4 | Autoreply
programme.desc: Tommie’s boyfriend busts her for using autoreplies to his love letters. But a heart-to-heart about the future reveals a new and even deeper issue between Tommie and Max.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E5 | Replacement
programme.desc: After finding out that Tommie is Max’s replacement, the conversation gets super awkward. But they have to change the subject when their ship gets hit by space junk traveling 10,000 mph.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E6 | Space Junk
programme.desc: Everything in their ship got hit…including Max. Now he and Tommie have to cobble together a plan to save their lives as the ship tumbles out of control. But that doesn’t stop them from continuing to argue about music.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E7 | EVA
programme.desc: They need a spacesuit. Their criminally negligent company didn’t supply one. So now Max is prepping to do a spacewalk using really, really inadvisable substitute gear. Tommie learns what it takes to be a true astronaut.

programme.title: Orbital Redux, S1 E8 | Moon Station
programme.desc: Looks like the training portion of the flight is over. Can Tommie show that she’s got the right stuff? Will Max survive the hull-walk from hell? Is the Tsiolkovsky on a one-way trip to oblivion…?
